# Support

## Getting Help

If you need help with Tributary, here are the best ways to get support:

### Documentation

- [Quick Start Guide](https://docs.tributary.so/quickstart/)
- [SDK Documentation](https://sdk.tributary.so)
- [API Reference](https://docs.tributary.so/api/)

### Community Support

- **Telegram**: Join our [Telegram Group](https://t.me/tributaryso) for community discussions and real-time help.
- **GitHub Discussions**: Use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/tributary-so/tributary/discussions) for questions and general discussion.

### Reporting Issues

- **Bugs**: Use the [Bug Report](https://github.com/tributary-so/tributary/issues/new?template=bug-report.md) template.
- **Feature Requests**: Use the [Feature Request](https://github.com/tributary-so/tributary/issues/new?template=feature-request.md) template.
- **Integration Requests**: Use the [Integration Request](https://github.com/tributary-so/tributary/issues/new?template=integration-request.md) template.

### Contact

For business inquiries or partnerships, email [hello@tributary.so](mailto:hello@tributary.so).

We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours.
